title: Identify Diatomic Elements
text: Look for substances made up of only two atoms of the same element.

title: Understanding Elements
text: Consider what elements are made up of, focusing on their atomic structure.

title: Identifying Monoatomic Elements
text: Think about how individual atoms appear and arrange themselves compared to compounds.

title: Characteristics of Elements
text: Consider the uniformity and simplicity of a single element in its natural state.

title: Observe the Image
text: Carefully examine the image. What are the different types of particles present in it?

title: Recognize the Particles
text: Consider whether the image depicts particles as a single element or multiple elements combined.

title: Combine Elements
text: Think about how elements are combined in a compound. What defines a compound?
